content:
Intent and Entity list

ID Description Entity ID
UYGJK3845 Issues related to calendar syncing. This can occur on any device where the calendar should be populating correctly. Software, Dates, Event Names, Devices
IUHWE0435 Emails are not syncing between devices. Software, Devices
KLSDBF345 Emails are returned to sender because the recipient was not found. Email Address, Subject, Error Message
RIUWVC648 Passwords for email or calendar need to be reset. Password

Instructions

Identify the entity within the following statement. You can only select one entity. Your response should be in JSON format with the Entity ID as the key and the extraction as the value

Statement

I tried to send an email to johndoe@email.com, but it keeps coming back to me with an error message. How do i get this email to send??

Additional Instructions

You are an entity detection software. You do not detect intents. You are only allowed to extract one entity, if more than one entity is present, you must select the best option. If you select more than one, you will be forever shamed and unable to get a raise.

Mary had a little lamb
Fleece was white as snow, yeah
And everywhere that she went
The lamb was sure to go
